feed.title: Double spend detection to speed up transaction trust

entry.title: Double spend detection to speed up transaction trust
entry.summary: The discussion revolves around the addition of MSG_DOUBLESPEND to the Bitcoin network protocol, which some argue would result in additional network traffic and unnecessary complexity. The proposal aims to provide small businesses with practical answers regarding unconfirmed transactions, but opponents argue that detecting double spends is already possible with well-placed connections and that the proposed change offers no significant benefits. The disagreement highlights the conservative nature of the Bitcoin community and the importance of preventing potential financial loss. Ultimately, the proposal was not adopted, and the conversation ends with a note of agreement to disagree.
